Item.Value: Well now, there's an adventurer if I've ever seen one. Welcome to town! I run the General Store. I'm sure I've got all manner of useful things in stock for you.
Hey there, $^$,hope you're feeling well today!
Hey, $^$, you don't happen to need any new weapons, do you? I've got a few at the shop that I think could come in handy.
Oh, hello $^$, What can I do for you? [Talk:Talk|Construct Buildings:BuyBuildings|Maintain Buildings:Maintenance|Never Mind:Cancel]
What do you want to do?[Upgrade Buildings:UpgradeBuilding|Move Buildings:Move|Destroy Buildings:Destroy]
